data.name: Party Down
data.detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


#label_about_the_series

Adam Scott (STEP BROTHERS, TV's PARKS AND RECREATION), Jane Lynch (TV's GLEE), Ken Marino (ROLE MODELS), Martin Starr (KNOCKED UP), Ryan Hansen (TV's VERONICA MARS), and Lizzy Caplan (TV's TRUE BLOOD) star as the employees of Hollywood catering company ‘Party Down,' a group of struggling actors and dysfunctional dreamers waiting for their big breaks while stuck serving hors d'oeurves. But in a town where everything is possible, can the ultimate going nowhere job ever get them anywhere?
data.about_the_game: Adam Scott (STEP BROTHERS, TV's PARKS AND RECREATION), Jane Lynch (TV's GLEE), Ken Marino (ROLE MODELS), Martin Starr (KNOCKED UP), Ryan Hansen (TV's VERONICA MARS), and Lizzy Caplan (TV's TRUE BLOOD) star as the employees of Hollywood catering company ‘Party Down,' a group of struggling actors and dysfunctional dreamers waiting for their big breaks while stuck serving hors d'oeurves. But in a town where everything is possible, can the ultimate going nowhere job ever get them anywhere?
data.short_description: A group of struggling actors and dysfunctional dreamers wait for their big break while they are stuck serving hors d'oeurves for a Hollywood catering company 'Party Down.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.

Minimum:

  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
